alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 1:25PM PST until December 11 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Central Oregon. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A heavy band of snow is forecast to set up across central Oregon this evening through Sunday evening. Despite the short lead time, forecast confidence remains low with regard to snow totals due to uncertainty in exactly where the band will track.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
